metadata.title: CVE-2022-41848 on Ubuntu 24.10 (oracular) - negligible
metadata.description: drivers/char/pcmcia/synclink_cs.c in the Linux kernel through 5.19.12 has arace condition and resultant use-after-free if a physically proximateattacker removes a PCMCIA device while calling ioctl, aka a race conditionbetween mgslpc_ioctl and mgslpc_detach.

criterions.comment: linux package in oracular is affected, but a decision has been made to defer addressing it (note: '2023.01.10').
linux-aws package in oracular is affected and may need fixing.
linux-azure package in oracular is affected and may need fixing.
linux-gcp package in oracular is affected and may need fixing.
linux-lowlatency package in oracular is affected and may need fixing.
linux-oracle package in oracular is affected and may need fixing.
linux-raspi package in oracular is affected and may need fixing.
